## About the World Happiness Report
- Publication of the Sustainable Development Solutions Network
- It's a review of the state of happiness around the world
- It consists of observed data on 
  - GDP per capita 
  - Social support
  - Healthy life expectancy
  - Freedom
  - Generosity
  - Corruption
